# addCamera(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds a new immersive camera definition to the venue descriptor.

## Declaration

```swift
final func addCamera(_ camera: ImmersiveCamera) throws
```

## Parameters

- **camera**: The [doc://com.apple.immersivemediasupport/documentation/ImmersiveMediaSupport/ImmersiveCamera] information to add.

## Discussion



## Configuring cameras

- **cameras**: An array of all the immersive cameras contained in the venue descriptor.
- **removeCamera(id:)**: Removes an immersive camera definition from the venue descriptor.
- **cameraViewModel(for:)**: Returns the camera view model for the given immersive camera identifier.
